overview: There was once a wonderful cinema in Seattle Wash called the Pike St. Cinema. It was owned and operated by Dennis Nyback for about 3 1/2 years this cinema played the best films no one else would show. This film is just a little splinter of time captured on filmâ€“a very special place in my life that will never be forgotten. I simply documented the cinema as it was including Nick the theater Cat.
title: A Little Splinter of Time
